me.mcblueparrot.spade.api

Class Vector

  • java.lang.Object
    • me.mcblueparrot.spade.api.Vector
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Cloneable<Vector>

    public class Vector
extends java.lang.Object
implements Cloneable<Vector>
    Represents a vector consisting of 3 double components.
